p.c: Ms. Paint: Introduce yourself to your audience.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn//homeslice/episodes/episode1/part1/003.gif[/img]


Alright. This is the day. You finally have the opportunity to interview your Creators. God, you are so excited! But you’ve gotta do your best to hide your excitement, gotta stay professional for the interviews, after all! Of course such a degree of restraint is hard, you have been waiting for this day for such a long time now. Now that’s more than enough dillydallying, you have a job to do!

You tell the audience that your name is Ms Paint and you are here at the residence of one of the ever-godly Creators for an interview. You are slightly nervous about this whole thing, it really does feel like a dream come true.

Here you go, knocking on the door.
[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn//homeslice/episodes/episode1/part1/004.gif[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn//homeslice/episodes/episode1/part1/005.gif[/img]
[color=#0715cd] JOHN: oh, hello there! JOHN: is there anything i can help you with? [/color]
Oh dear, it’s really him. THE Heir of Breath. Ok calm down, calm down, you don’t want to embarrass yourself.
[color=#0715cd] JOHN: :? JOHN: you alright? [/color]
Right, you’re here for an interview. You inform him that you would like to ask him and his roommate a few questions, provided that he is okay with you doing so?
[color=#0715cd] JOHN: yes, i’d love to! JOHN: please, come right in! [/color]

You thank him for his insightful answers. Next, you ask about their residence and why it's just such an average little home, considering they have all the means to own something like a mansion, much like the Page of Hope does.

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn//homeslice/episodes/episode1/part1/020.png[/img]


Very interesting. That wasn’t the answer you were expecting, but you can certainly understand where he’s coming from!

Oh! That reminds you! And what about their relationship status? A lot of people have been speculating if they might be together, considering that they also live together.

You are now THE FEROCIOUS LITTLE DRAGON, or as everyone else likes to call you, CASEY, also known as VICEROY BUBBLES VON SALAMANCER. You aren’t exactly sure what you’re supposed to be doing at a party. Maybe you could just waddle around like always, asking people for uppies…
Yes, that sounds like a good idea.

What's this? Could it be... no, it can't be. There's no way. You refuse to believe that what you're witnessing in front of you is real. It's the remarkably empowering feeling of NARRATIVE AGENCY! Just look at all those different options! Six whole character pairs just ripe for your keen, professional reader's eyes to peer upon at your own leisure! Okay, don't get too power hungry just yet. Take your time, look upon this startlingly wide panel and make an educated decision as to which pair you'd like to witness interacting first. There's no rush. You're in control now, at least for the pages spread across this decision-based batch of pages. Jane wanted me to wear a costume, so here I am.[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: that doesn’t seem like a very pleasant costume, if your experience with “going trickster” is anything like mine.[/color] [color=#f2a400]DIRK: I... DIRK: Oh, man. DIRK: Fucking god dammit.[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: what?[/color] [color=#f2a400]DIRK: You’re definitely right, for fuck’s sake. DIRK: God dammit, insensitive piece of shit...[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: right about...what. JOHN: what?? JOHN: i can’t see into your head, dude. you’re having a completely out of context crisis right now.[/color] [color=#f2a400]DIRK: It’s stupid, agh. Whatever, don’t worry about it. DIRK: It’s just...Jane, Roxy and Jake had a much different trickster high than me. DIRK: They did a lot of things they regret, and I don’t think having me dressed as a walking reminder of said regrets is exactly pleasant for them. DIRK: Jane asked me to wear a costume after I paraded around angrily like an unwilling infant and then I pull out this shit? DIRK: I guess it simply slipped my mind, but—[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: woah, dude, slow down. JOHN: i’m sure it’s fine. no one has said anything yet. JOHN: they probably won’t even notice. JOHN: ... JOHN: hm. JOHN: why was your trickster experience so different from theirs?[/color] [color=#f2a400]DIRK: I’m not really sure. DIRK: Trickster mode is supposed to make you reckless and lose your inhibitions. DIRK: But it just made me nihilistic and defeatist.[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: maybe that’s just how you get when you lose your inhibitions.[/color] [color=#f2a400]DIRK: I... DIRK: I think that’s enough brain-picking from you, Egbert.[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: i was just making conversation. JOHN: you’re not mad or anything, right?[/color] [color=#f2a400]DIRK: No, I’m not mad. That’d be a rather ridiculous thing to get mad about.[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: ok. JOHN: y’know, uh. JOHN: you were, uh. JOHN: there was a time, um, not... JOHN: ...never mind, it’s not important.[/color] [color=#f2a400]DIRK: Okay?[/color] [color=#0715cd]JOHN: good talk![/color] [color=#f2a400]DIRK: Okay, then...see you arou—and he’s gone.[/color]

p.c: Ms. Paint: Ask the Seer some questions.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/episodes/episode1/part3/023.gif[/img] Well, now that the Seer of Light is here you suppose there’s no better time to ask her the obligatory question! What does she spend her time doing?
[color=#b536da] ROSE: I took my writing abilities I honed through writing as a child up as an occupation. ROSE: That is, I am an author. ROSE: If I were to pick a crowning achievement of my career, I’d be obligated to select my Sburb biography. ROSE: To my expectations, the book became a hit. [/color]

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/episodes/episode1/part3/024A.gif[/img] [img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/episodes/episode1/part3/024B.gif[/img]
[color=#b536da] ROSE: My first experience in dabbling with writing about Sburb originated from a comprehensive guide to the game while it was in session. ROSE: Of course, this biographical account contains much more information about the events themselves than my premature guide might have touched upon. ROSE: John certainly made the development of this book...interesting. [/color]

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/episodes/episode1/part3/025A.gif[/img] [img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/episodes/episode1/part3/025B.gif[/img] The Heir was involved? That’s unexpected! He never mentioned anything about a book when you interviewed him. You not-so-subtly ponder about what he contributed to the book out loud.
[color=#b536da] ROSE: His involvement was complicated, to say the least. ROSE: He was in charge of the illustrations, and so we devised a creative way, so to speak, of gathering images. ROSE: In order for Sburb’s nature to be adequately captured in the book, John used his retconning abilities to go back into the game briefly and take a few pictures. ROSE: We were pleased to see that most of them came out beautifully. [/color]

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/episodes/episode1/part3/026.gif[/img] You aren’t quite sure what all of that really entails, but what you are sure of is that whatever ambiguously complicated matter the Heir contributed to was absolutely essential to the completion of the book! Aside from that, how is the relationship between these two ladies going?
[color=#008141] KANAYA: I Would Be Remiss To Not State Its Going Very Well KANAYA: Even That Seems To Not Be An Adequate Descriptor [/color] [color=#b536da] ROSE: Sensationally. [/color] [color=#008141] KANAYA: Yes That Seems Better [/color]

p.c: Ms. Paint: speak to the incredibly fashionable Salamander.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/episodes/episode1/part3/039.gif[/img] This little salamander evidently has quite the sense of fashion!
[color=#008141] KANAYA: That He Does KANAYA: I Would Like To Say That I Was At Least Partly Responsible KANAYA: But He Developed An Individualized Sense Of Fashion On His Own KANAYA: And I Must Say KANAYA: A Superb One At That [/color]

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/episodes/episode1/part3/040.gif[/img] Hm, well… you aren’t sure that you have any more questions planned. In fact, you’ve already breezed through all of them! Every single one. You’re honestly having some trouble believing it! You didn’t even come close to running out of time this time around! You suppose that it’s time to head out then! Never hurts to be too early to an interview. Provided you aren’t an absurd amount of time early. Then it’d just be fairly uncomfortable. Anyways! You thank the Seer and the Sylph for their valuable time, it made for a nice change of pace compared to the relative chaos of the other interviews.
[color=#b536da] ROSE: Happy to help. [/color] [color=#008141] KANAYA: It Was A Pleasure [/color] [color=#b536da] ROSE: Good luck on your next interview. [/color]

Sellin’ these beautiful wares. Fuckin’ joyous occupation. Fondness for selling various Creator-themed holiday goods has run in your family for generations. Your great great grandmother even said it’s been running in the family for all 5005 years of this planet’s existence!

You have perfected the art of selling wares. So perfected is your talent for it that calling it perfected almost feels like an understatement! Nobody ever walks by your stands and escapes with their wallet intact. Nobody.

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/christmasspecial2020/007.gif[/img]


Oh my gods. Is that who you think it is? Could it be? Have four of the Creators shown up to celebrate the holiday celebrating most of their birthdays? No, surely they must be a group of people in costume.

Yes. That strikes you as the most logical explanation to what you are seeing.

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/christmasspecial2020/008A.gif[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/christmasspecial2020/008B.gif[/img]


They noticed you! Why are you feeling so nervous about this, they’re just a couple of people wearing silly costumes for the holiday! Like one of those mythical “Mall Santas” you’ve heard legends about from Earth A and Earth B times!

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/christmasspecial2020/009.gif[/img]


Here they come! Better get your gameface on, these people are obviously very big fans of the Creators and must have very high standards for merchandise based around their favorites.

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/christmasspecial2020/010.gif[/img] It’s a figure of speech, you don’t actually have a gameface to put on! However, you cannot deny that would be a very nice thing to have. You spend just a bit too long mentally humoring the idea. Oh, here they are! Hello there, may you interest these fine folk in any of your high-quality wares solely themed around the Day of the Creators?
[color=#4ac925] JADE: woah! this stuff is so neat! JADE: awww rose look at that, they have your signature on a sweater [/color] [color=#b536da] ROSE: Charming. ROSE: It does look fairly comfortable, but I can’t deny that it may feel just a bit egotistical to wear a sweater with my own name lovingly plastered on it. [/color] [color=#e00707] DAVE: yeah hey uh humble question DAVE: how much are the dave strider hoodies DAVE: ill take ten of them [/color]

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/christmasspecial2020/011.gif[/img]


Wow, that was quite a few boons worth of wares you just sold right there! But that’s only one out of these four folk, you’re sure you can get more boons out of this! Gotta keep the business afloat after all.

p.c: [I] HS: Sell to the boy dressed as the Heir of Breath.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/christmasspecial2020/012.gif[/img] You there! Boy! He looks like he has a stellar taste in Heir-themed apparel! May you interest him in one of your mockup pogo hammers? Or, if he’s feeling especially eccentric today, a replica Wrinklefucker? Guaranteed to be produced through only the utmost quality of alchemy replacements!
[color=#0715cd] JOHN: oh, um... JOHN: i already own both of those things, but i guess supporting some local business couldn’t hurt. JOHN: they do look pretty accurate, too. [/color]
Ah, you see! A fine connoisseur of Heir merchandise. You’re certain he’ll find only the most satisfactory of experiences with your hammer replicas!

p.c: [I] HS: Market towards the Seer of Light girl.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/christmasspecial2020/013.gif[/img] You can tell this fine lady has immaculate taste in anything and everything to do with the Seer of Light. Now you know she isn’t the biggest fan of the signature design, so how about you offer her a Light-themed hoodie? They’re so comfy you’d swear they were alchemized directly from the Seer of Light’s godly robes themselves!
[color=#b536da] ROSE: Hm, why not? ROSE: I could always use another sweater. I’ll take one, thank you. [/color]

p.c: [I] HS: Bargain with the Witch lookalike.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/christmasspecial2020/014.gif[/img] How about this young lady? You’ve gotta say, her Witch of Space outfit is already top notch! Those who dress up as her tend to have issues making the dog ears look realistic, but she’s pulled it off incredibly well. Perhaps you can interest her in a plushie of the mythical first guardian Becquerel?
[color=#4ac925] JADE: oh my god yes you very much could interest me!!! JADE: this is the best plushie ive ever seen JADE: thank you so much!!!!! [/color]

p.c: [I] HS: Reap the rewards of a successful business day.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/intermissions/christmasspecial2020/015.gif[/img]


Uhm, ma’am? The plush only costs- welp there she goes. It’s about time you close up shop anyway, the celebration’s going to finish up shortly. Today has been one successful business day! Probably the most successful business day you can recall in recent history. Thank the gods for cosplayers, huh?

Perhaps you’ll invest all this extra money you got today into expanding your business. And, if you really want to start dreaming big, finally break the 5005 year long tradition of operating out of simple stands at various celebrations! Hah, one can only dream.

You're strolling down the boardwalk with your diligent cameraman, Jack Noir. The view is undeniably beautiful. The ocean breeze, the bracing smell of the coastal town, it all fills you with the confidence you need to finish up these last couple of interviews. 

The past few have gone incredibly well, and you have no reason to doubt that the last collection of the same will be any different. Well, you at least hope so.

You suppose you’ll ask Jack how he thinks the next interview is going to go.

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/episodes/episode1/part4/004.gif[/img]


…

He isn't very talkative today, at least when it comes to the interviews. Perhaps he's just in a bad mood? That, or he’s just getting tired of lugging that heavy camera around. Either way, you make sure to remind him that you two can hang out anywhere he wants after you've finished the interviews.

[img]https://file.garden/X1AaUgJ0DEp_tpSn/homeslice/episodes/episode1/part4/005.gif[/img]

Must be even prettier inside, you can't wait to find out first hand. Even though you may have met the Muse and Rogue during the Game, you didn't really get a chance to talk. Pressing circumstances and whatnot.

You assure the Cherub that it is quite alright. Now that you’re looking at the time, you were a tad more punctual than necessary, despite the fact that you thought such circumstances were the opposite.

You agree, it *has* been a while. Almost five whole years! Cause for celebration, you suppose, considering you had been grappling with the possibility the day may never come. The Creators have become idols to this society, so meeting them and talking to them personally has been a huge honor. It really is something to think about, how you were there when it all happened. But this is no time to dwell on the past, you have an interview to hold!

[color=929292]CALLIOPE: oh my! :U CALLIOPE: i do hope everything is alright, mr. jack![/color]
Jack nods in response. You really start to wonder what has gotten into him. Of course, he isn’t usually that talkative, but today he took it to a whole new level! Oh well, you can talk to him about it after your interview duties are done and over with.

It's more about the pain, the absolute unmatched suffering you are inflicting on the person who is lucky enough to have met your knife up close and personal. It is the quickening flow of their bl-

Huh?

Ms. Paint’s just given you a firm nudge, one that is uncomfortably close to shrieking "you should stop". She smiles afterwards, but those eyes hide a hint of bizarrely motherly frustration towards you, like she's going to deck you at any given moment should you step out of line again. She’s lucky she’s someone you can tolerate, you wouldn’t be taking this from literally anybody else.

Right, the interview. You should most definitely stop getting sidetracked, or you'll never finish! There are still 3 more interviews you've got to have after this, there's no time to waste.

So, you ask, how is Jack feeling now? Does he feel better?

He nods a little in response. You’re glad! Even if...it required him getting his hands on a knife, the interview went smoothly. You can’t ask for much more from your #1 cameraman! You’ll make compromises where you can, and if Jack is happy, so are you.

He tells you to not get your hopes too high, but you can’t help yourself. Jack hasn’t stabbed anyone, even with access to a knife. Today was a roaring success.

You, personally, are very excited, because after this you’ll go on to the Page of Hopes and the Prince of Heart’s residence, and then you’ll be almost done for today!

Then you move on to the questions. You decide to ask about her current occupation.
[color=#00d5f2]JANE: Well, for starters, I am the owner and CEO of Crockercorp.[/color] [color=#00d5f2]JANE: And as you can see, I also work here![/color] [color=#00d5f2]JANE: If you couldn’t already tell, my favorite hobby is baking, so this is like a fun part-time job to relieve all the stress from the real work.[/color]

[color=#00d5f2]JANE: I’m sure it sounds exhausting in theory, and it most likely would be for anyone else except me, but…[/color] [color=#00d5f2]JANE: I honestly do enjoy seeing people eat the pastries and sweets that I bake. I think that’s what motivates me to keep at this![/color] [color=#00d5f2]JANE: And about Crockercorp, hmmm…[/color] [color=#00d5f2]JANE: I’m not sure if you know about her, she’s not the most outgoing, to my knowledge.[/color] [color=#00d5f2]JANE: Her name is Jasprose.[/color]
You feel like you’ve heard that name before, but you’re not exactly sure.
[color=#00d5f2]JANE: She’s very smart and lovely, don't get me wrong, but…[/color] [color=#00d5f2]JANE: She can be a bit much sometimes. We still get along well despite that, though.[/color] [color=#00d5f2]JANE: Oh! I almost forgot.[/color] [color=#00d5f2]JANE: Dirk helps a lot with the company too![/color] [color=#00d5f2]JANE: His main profession doesn’t have anything to do with business or politics, but he co-owns Skaianet with Jake![/color] [color=#00d5f2]JANE: Although he barely does anything paperwork and business-wise, he’s more of an advisor for Jake and me.[/color]

You are now PROBLEM SLEUTH.

You are one of the top Problem Sleuths in the city. Solicitations for your service are numerous in quantity. Compensation, adequate. It is a balmy summer evening. And it seems like you have a case, waiting to be solved. Dames, waiting to be rescued.

Well, if you think about it, there ARE dames involved with the case, as one of them just hired you! You suppose you'll be doing a favor for this lovely lady if and when you find and return the stolen item.
